About Me

Here goes...

BIO

As a child I always had the innate ability to sketch. Brilliant with color combinations and an eye for creativity.

But I lost that aspect of myself sadly. Lucky art is dynamic and always changing with the times. I have found a new way to create through digital art and design.

My style is inspired by the limitless variations. The vibrance of the colors and simplicity in it all.

I've been perfecting my craft for over a month now. But in my head for many months on end ðŸ˜…. I have only began to manifest and perfect my creations.

My ah ha moment was when. I realised I was an artist and couldn't ignoring it any longer. Realising that I cant do without creativity. I got my first job in marketing and branding, it felt right at home but to be happy I needed art as a direct influence to my life.

So far none but I am open to anyone who'd want to work with me.

I hope to work with Reebok SA. I love their retro style and ultimately Sony. I want to reach/inspire the Innovators, the artists, the creatives and the rebels who dont subscribe to the structural limitations of our environment.
